name: Metaverse Ninja
description:
In Metaverse, Shithead meets Kitsune, an intelligent nine-tails fox-like creature, who masters the secret ninja technique "Scroll of Metaverse".
Shithead managed to befriend with Kitsune and learned how to become a ninja. 
Now, Shithead can move like a ninja! only a ninja can stop a ninja!

I put the second orb, one of the seven Shit Balls from "Journey to The Metaverse", hidden on this artwork, look for it and have fun!
clue: somehow the orbs is a part of some props 

5000x3500px
